alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Liberty and Franklin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles southeast of Stonemill Creek to 9 miles southwest of Apalachicola. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, East Camp, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, Yent Place, St George Island St Pk, Beverly, Green Point, Owens Bridge, Poplar Camp, Bay City, Sumatra and Apalachicola Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
